mapper.select: SELECT ano, aname, aprice, adisprice, aphoto, aartist, TO_CHAR(ardate, 'YY-MM-DD') AS aldate, num FROM (SELECT ano, aname, aprice, adisprice, aphoto, aartist, ardate, rownum AS num FROM (SELECT ano, aname, aprice, adisprice, aphoto, aartist, ardate FROM ALBUM_STORE ORDER BY ano ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT ano, arating, aphoto, aname, aartist, REPLACE(REPLACE(aprice, ',', ''), '원', '') AS aprice, adis, REPLACE(REPLACE(adisprice, ',', ''), '원', '') AS adisprice, aimg, aintro, adetail, acategory, TO_CHAR(ardate, 'YY-MM-DD') AS aldate FROM ALBUM_STORE WHERE ano = #{ano}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM album_store order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) WHERE rownum<=4
